diff_hunk:
@@ -2202,9 +2202,9 @@ def conv1d(value, filters, stride, padding,
       the filter is moved right at each step.
     padding: 'SAME' or 'VALID'
     use_cudnn_on_gpu: An optional `bool`.  Defaults to `True`.
-    data_format: An optional `string` from `"NHWC", "NCHW"`.  Defaults
-      to `"NHWC"`, the data is stored in the order of
-      [batch, in_width, in_channels].  The `"NCHW"` format stores
+    data_format: An optional `string` from `"NWC", "NCW"`.  Defaults
body: We cannot change the signature this way, as @jhseu said, this is a backwards incompatible change. Instead, you could accept both NHWC and NWC. You can even only document NWC to push users away from NHWC. Optionally, you can use @deprecated_arg_values to mark NWHC explicitly deprecated (will trigger a warning if used).
body_html: We cannot change the signature this way, as @jhseu said, this is a backwards incompatible change. Instead, you could accept both NHWC and NWC. You can even only document NWC to push users away from NHWC. Optionally, you can use @deprecated_arg_values to mark NWHC explicitly deprecated (will trigger a warning if used).
body_text: We cannot change the signature this way, as @jhseu said, this is a backwards incompatible change. Instead, you could accept both NHWC and NWC. You can even only document NWC to push users away from NHWC. Optionally, you can use @deprecated_arg_values to mark NWHC explicitly deprecated (will trigger a warning if used).
